TopicTitle: Good Android tablet pay one no energy bar games?

Articles.Content: Dos any one know of any good Android Tablet game that is pay once and with no stupid energy bar wait system like what Facebook games have?And i am looking for flight/space/car simulation & or ActionFPS/TPS/ActionRPG.And genres that do not interest me are CRPG/JRPG/Moba/point&click adventure.Any good games that you guys recommend me that are not CRPG/JRPG/Moba/point&click adventure games?
KotOR has been released for Android not too long ago.
Bloons TD Battles is worth a shot, it's free, and while is DOES have an energy bar, you don't actually need to use any energy to play, it's only used for special abilities.

Galaxy on Fire 2 might be of interest; it's a space game with around 20 star systems, and you start with the puniest ship. Work your way up from there. There's a short storyline, too. It's actually really good for a tablet game.
I believe Simple Rockets and Simple Planes both use a traditional just-buy-the-game model. Minecraft Pocket Edition too.

SpaceChem? (demo)

Admittedly a puzzle game doesn't fall into either mentioned bin.

I believe Simple Rockets and Simple Planes both use a traditional just-buy-the-game model. Minecraft Pocket Edition too.

It's kind of sad when "just buy the game" is considered a traditional model
